rows.label: qst003501_msg0001
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Hey, Karze!!! Give it back!

rows.label: qst003501_msg0002
rows.name:
My da salvaged that for me! It's
important to me!

rows.label: qst003501_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh, salvaged goods, eh? Where did he
salvage it from?

rows.label: qst003501_msg0004
rows.name:
Th-there's this salvage spot
in the relay base...

rows.label: qst003501_msg0005
rows.name: What, from inside the base?

rows.label: qst003501_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, that means it's Superbian
property! So it's mine!

rows.label: qst003501_msg0007
rows.name:
Th-the Salvager's Code says salvaged
goods belong to whoever-

rows.label: qst003501_msg0008
rows.name:
Shut it, you! Why don't you just go and
salvage another one?

rows.label: qst003501_msg0009
rows.name:
Do that, and maybe I'll give you this
one back.

rows.label: qst003501_msg0010
rows.name:
Th...that's not fair!
I can't just...

rows.label: qst003501_msg0011
rows.name:
Whatever. I'm not going to give it to
you for nothing.

rows.label: qst003501_msg0012
rows.name: Dad...*sniff*...I'm so sorry...

rows.label: qst003501_msg0013
rows.name:
There's no way I can get another
Morph Orb like the one my da got me...

rows.label: qst003501_msg0014
rows.name: My da wanted to become a Driver, see.

rows.label: qst003501_msg0015
rows.name:
Said we'd have a better life if he was
a Driver. Better than being a veg
farmer anyway.

rows.label: qst003501_msg0016
rows.name:
B-but when he touched the Crystal...
It...it was horrible... There was all this
blood, and then he...he just...

rows.label: qst003501_msg0017
rows.name:
So, um...my da isn't going to be
salvaging any more Morph Orbs...

rows.label: qst003501_msg0018
rows.name:
That one was all I had
to remember him by...

rows.label: qst003501_msg0019
rows.name:
You're going to salvage me one?
Thank you!

rows.label: qst003501_msg0020
rows.name:
My da said he was in the relay
base when he salvaged it.

rows.label: qst003501_msg0021
rows.name:
But I don't know how you'd
get in there...
